data.actual_result: Call timer continues to show how long the call has been going on for
data.expected_result: Call time should not continue to go up, but instead show the normal blue “Redial” button in the middle
data.short_description: Call timer does not stop after the other person leaves the call.
data.steps_to_repro: - start a call with someone  - talk for however long - have them leave/hang up
